Block - Interface in smartblocks.block
Interface for every block in the simulation

A factory of Blocks implemented as a singleton

BlockFactory.SingletonHolder - Class in smartblocks.block
SingletonHolder is loaded on the first execution of Singleton.getInstance() or the first access to SingletonHolder.INSTANCE, not before.
